name: How a Rabbit Save the World
name_original: How a Rabbit Save the World
description:
This game is an elaboration project based on the original action game (https://bfod.itch.io/clone-assignment-2). In the game, players will play as a rabbit (yes indeed, you are a rabbit) to fight against evil robots in a space station.  Players can use the environment, special item, and their skills to defeat countless and challenge the giant robot hidden in the station.

Play Instruction:

Press "AD" to move left and right

Press "W" to jump

Press "Space" to fire bullet

Press "R" to switch between different ammunition mode
